org.bsc.bean
Class PropertyDescriptorField

java.lang.Object
  java.beans.FeatureDescriptor
      java.beans.PropertyDescriptor
          org.bsc.bean.PropertyDescriptorField
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynaPropertyDescriptorField, PropertyDescriptorJoin, PropertyDescriptorPK
public class PropertyDescriptorField
extends java.beans.PropertyDescriptor

PropertyDescriptor extension for manage generic DataBase field 

 PropertyDescriptorField _prop = new PropertyDescriptorField("propName", beanClass, "getpropName", "setpropName");
 _prop.setFieldName("field name");
 _prop.setSQLType( java.sql.Types.XXXXX );

public PropertyDescriptorField setSQLType(int type)

property typeSQL type
 
boolTypes.BIT
 
int,longTypes.INTEGER
 
double,floatTypes.DOUBLE
 
StringTypes.VARCHAR (default)

Parameters:

isPrimaryKey

setFormatPattern

public void setFormatPattern(java.lang.String pattern)
set output format pattern based on java.text.* package this method is same of : property.setValue( BeanManagerUtils.FORMATPATTERN, pattern ); 
  Example.:

  Boolean use {0,choice,0#false string|1#true string}
  Number like class DecimalFormat
  Date like SimpleDateFormat

Parameters:
format - pattern
See Also:
DecimalFormat, SimpleDateFormat

setFunctionPattern

public PropertyDescriptorField setFunctionPattern(java.lang.String pattern)

 set SQL function pattern (MessageFormat compatible) for field.
 the {0} identify the field name

 Ex.:

 property.setFunctionPattern( "MAX( {0} )");

Parameters:
pattern - a like java.text.MessageFormat pattern
See Also:
MessageFormat.format(java.lang.Object[], java.lang.StringBuffer, java.text.FieldPosition)
